Query.1: SELECT id, CASE WHEN LENGTH(username) > 5 THEN 'LONG' ELSE 'SHORT' END AS name_type FROM users;
Query.2: SELECT id, (SELECT MAX(balance) FROM accounts WHERE accounts.user_id = users.id) AS max_balance FROM users;
Query.3: SELECT username FROM users UNION SELECT email FROM admins;
Query.4: SELECT table_name FROM information_schema.tables WHERE table_schema = DATABASE();
Query.5: SELECT * FROM users WHERE user_id = 1 OR 1=1;
Query.6: SELECT * FROM users WHERE username = 'admin' OR 'a'='a';
Query.7: SELECT * FROM users WHERE id = 5 OR 1<2;
Query.8: SELECT * FROM users WHERE active = 0 OR TRUE;
Query.9: SELECT * FROM users WHERE id = 999 OR 1;
Query.10: SELECT * FROM users WHERE password = 'test' OR id=id;
Query.11: SELECT * FROM accounts WHERE balance < 100 OR 2>1;
Query.12: SELECT * FROM users WHERE role = 'guest' OR 1!=2;
Query.13: SELECT id FROM users; DELETE FROM accounts WHERE balance = 0;
Query.14: SELECT id FROM users WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM accounts WHERE user_id=users.id AND balance > IF(1=1, SLEEP(3), 0));
Query.15: ALTER TABLE users ADD COLUMN temp_id INT;
Query.19: UPDATE users SET email = ? WHERE id = ?;
Query.20: SELECT * FROM users u JOIN accounts a ON u.id = ?;
Query.22: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM users GROUP BY role HAVING COUNT(*) > ?;
Query.23: SELECT * FROM users WHERE id = SLEEP(?);
Query.24: SELECT username FROM users WHERE id = ? UNION SELECT email FROM admins;
Query.25: SELECT * FROM users WHERE id = ? OR username = 'admin';
